channel.title: Cyber on Bayesian Politics
channel.description: Recent content in Cyber on Bayesian Politics

item.title: Why do we as Data Scientists care about how computers communicate?
item.description: You turn on your computer, and connect to the WiFi. You open your browser and remember that you have to pay your credit card. You search for the bank’s name and click the first link you see, because the first one is always the correct one. You submit the credit card information and then get an email confirming your payment.
